name: Cars
summary: Cars is a 2006 American computer-animated sports comedy film produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures.

name: Toy Story
summary: Toy Story is a 1995 American computer-animated comedy film produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures.

name: Up
summary: Up is a 2009 American computer-animated film directed by Pete Docter, and co-written by Bob Peterson.

name: Inside Out
summary: nside Out is a 2015 American computer-animated film directed by Pete Docter, who wrote the script with Meg LeFauve and Josh Cooley.

name: Jack-Jack Attack
summary: Jack-Jack Attack is a 2005 computer animated short film produced by Pixar and written and directed by Brad Bird. The short film is a spin-off on his 2004 film The Incredibles.

name: The Good Dinosaur
summary: he Good Dinosaur is a 2015 American computer-animated adventure film[7] produced by Pixar Animation Studios and distributed by Walt Disney Studios Motion Pictures.

name: WALL-E
summary: WALL-E (stylized with an interpunct as WALLÂ·E) is a 2008 American computer-animated science fiction film[4] produced by Pixar Animation Studios and released by Walt Disney Pictures.
